description: Detects suspicious scheduled task creations with commands that are uncommon
false_positives: Software installers that run from temporary folders and also install scheduled tasks
name: Suspicious Add Scheduled Command Pattern
query: ((process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:*\/Create\ *) AND ((process.command_line:(*\/sc\ minute\ * OR *\/ru\ system\ *) AND process.command_line:(*cmd.exe\ \/c\ * OR *cmd\ \/c*)) OR process.command_line:(*\ bypass\ * OR *.DownloadString* OR *.DownloadFile* OR *FromBase64String* OR *\ \-w\ hidden\ * OR *\ IEX* OR *\ \-enc\ * OR *\ \-decode\ * OR *\/c\ start\ \/min\ * OR *\ curl\ *) OR (process.command_line:*\/xml\ C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Local\\*) OR (process.command_line:*wscript.exe* AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\*)))
author: Florian Roth
